text: is a brand of instant ramen cups made in 1971, which is produced by a Japanese food company called Nissin Foods. Single servings of this product are stored in foam, plastic, or paper cups and they are prepared by adding boiling water. == Related pages == * Pot Noodle == References == ==Other websites== * Cup Noodles official website (in Japanese) Category:Noodles Category:Ramen
title: Cup Noodles
